lyrics:
Bulgarian/English
Cyrillic script
Translation



Bulgarian/English
Oh… oh…
Byakhme detsa, nyakoi sa porasnali
Drugite ne sa, ostanakha si angeli
V teb e klyucha, vratite sa zatvoreni
Zad tyakh zhivee angel sŭs krila
Angel si ti, ne vyarvash li
Angel pŭtya ti predskazva
Angel si ti, zabravi li
Lyubovta ti go dokazva
Oh… oh…
Oh… oh…
You’re an angel born to be free
But I’ve got you and you’ve got me
When the lights go down, you bring me salvation
When the tears run dry, you appear
To save and love and comfort me
Till the end of time you will always be my angel
My love, my love
You’re an angel, my love
Oh… oh…
Oh… oh…
Angel si ti, ne vyarvash li
Angel pŭtya ti predskazva
Angel si ti, zabravi li
Lyubovta ti go dokazva
